Approved memory cards The following SD memory cards have been tested and approved for use in the camera. Cards with class 6 or faster write speeds are recommended for movie recording. Recording may end unexpectedly when cards with slower write speeds are used. SD memory cards SDHC memory cards* 2 SDXC memory cards* 3 SanDisk 2GB* 1 4 GB, 8 GB, 16 GB, 32 GB 64 GB Toshiba Panasonic 4 GB, 6 GB, 8 GB, 12 GB, 16 GB, 24 GB, 32 GB 48 GB, 64 GB Lexar Media 4 GB, 8 GB, 16 GB - Platinum II 4 GB, 8 GB, 16 GB, 32 GB Professional Full-HD Video - 4 GB, 8 GB, 16 GB *1 Check that any card readers or other devices with which the card will be used support 2 GB cards. *2 Check that any card readers or other devices with which the card will be used are SDHC-compliant. The camera supports UHS-I. *3 Check that any card readers or other devices with which the card will be used are SDXC-compliant. The camera supports UHS-I.
